short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: APIGenie is Endpoint Composer. With APIGenie, you can effortlessly create custom API endpoints tailored to your specific needs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
APIGenie is a powerful and versatile tool for API development that simplifies creating custom API endpoints and simulating server responses. With APIGenie, anyone can easily design, prototype, and test their APIs, enabling them to iterate quickly and experiment with different ideas. Whether you're building a frontend UI, backend server, or mobile app, APIGenie provides a user-friendly interface and powerful features to streamline your workflow and enhance productivity. By leveraging APIGenie, QA can accelerate the QA process, by creating scenarios much faster way.


How to Use:

User can select status code then choose HTTP method then user has to select content type, currently APIGenie supports only 'application/json' and 'text/email'. Then user has to provide response body as per content type then click on create. Then APIGenie will create API endpoint for the user and show it on the extension.

Note - user can hit generated API endpoint for 10 times then generated API endpoint will be deleted permanently. Then User can create new one.
